Posts.Content: Carolyn, You said, "Have you had an ultra-sound, mammogram or MRI of your breast? That would tell a lot." I went yesterday for my first mammogram and ultra-sound because I have a lump. I meet with the surgeon tomorrow. Wanted to know can he tell from these reports "if" it may be cancer? I'm sure I will be going for a biopsy but that may be another week or two. Just curious... Thanks
Posts.Title: Visible Lump
